items.title: Cryptocurrency Billionaire’s Space Startup In Talks For $2 Billion Valuation
items.description: Jed McCaleb, who made billions from blockchain networks Ripple and Stellar, has been Vast’s primary funder to date.

items.title: iOS 26.2: Apple Issues Critical Update For Millions Of iPhones In Unprecedented Release
items.description: After rumors of delays, the next iPhone update is here, right on time. Here’s why the new update is important.

items.title: New York Approves Casino Sites—With Trump And Billionaire Steve Cohen Standing To Gain
items.description: The state’s Gaming Facility Board approved the casinos earlier this month before passing recommendations to the Gaming Commission for the final vote.

items.title: ‘Escape From Tarkov’ Sells Over A Million Copies In First Month
items.description: Escape From Tarkov has sold over a million copies since launching last month, and to celebrate players can unlock an in-game reward.

items.title: First-Ever Humanoid Robot App Store Launches So You Can Make Your Robot Dance And Fight
items.description: There's an app for everything. And everything has an App Store. Including, now, humanoid robots, courtesy of Unitree.
